scripts.lint: echo Checking for lint errors... && eslint ./src --ext .ts && stylelint "./src/**/*.scss"
scripts.lint:fix: echo Checking and fixing lint errors... && eslint ./src --fix --ext .ts && stylelint "./src/**/*.scss" --fix
scripts.webpack:chromium: echo Building platform CHROMIUM to ./build/chromium... && rimraf ./build/chromium && webpack --config ./webpack/chromium.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:chromium: npm run lint:fix && npm run webpack:chromium
scripts.package:chromium: npm run lint:fix && echo Packaging platform CHROMIUM... && rimraf ./build/chromium && webpack --config ./webpack/chromium.config.js --mode production && node ./scripts/update-build-number.js chromium && node ./scripts/create-zip-package.js chromium
scripts.webpack:firefox: echo Building platform FIREFOX to ./build/firefox... && rimraf ./build/firefox && webpack --config ./webpack/firefox.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:firefox: npm run lint:fix && npm run webpack:firefox
scripts.package:firefox: npm run lint:fix && echo Packaging platform FIREFOX... && rimraf ./build/firefox && webpack --config ./webpack/firefox.config.js --mode production && node ./scripts/update-build-number.js firefox && node ./scripts/create-zip-package.js firefox
scripts.webpack:android: echo Building platform ANDROID to ./build/android... && rimraf ./build/android && webpack --config ./webpack/android.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:android: npm run lint:fix && npm run webpack:android
scripts.package:android: npm run lint:fix && echo Packaging platform ANDROID... && rimraf ./build/android && webpack --config ./webpack/android.config.js --mode production && node ./scripts/update-build-number.js android && node ./scripts/create-apk-package.js
